tool_description: Advanced lead generation with customizable filters and real-time updates to collect and contact leads.
name: Lead Generator
title: Lead Generator

api_list.name: Create Copywriting Prompt
api_list.description: Generates clever prompts for copywriting via ChatGPT.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://lead-generator.p.rapidapi.com/business/copywriting-prompt"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "lead-generator.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

import requests

url = "https://lead-generator.p.rapidapi.com/business/copywriting-prompt"

headers = {
